total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the transformation from the input grid to the output grid in the examples.
Q2: Notice that the output grid is a 3x6 grid, and it is formed by taking specific rows from the input grid.
Q3: Identify which rows are taken from the input grid to form the output grid.
Q4: Notice that the rows taken from the input grid are not exactly the same in the output grid, some values are changed.
Q5: Identify the rule for changing the values in the rows taken from the input grid.
Q6: Apply the identified rules to the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.

Q3: Identify which rows are taken from the input grid to form the output grid.
Q4: Notice that the rows taken from the input grid are not exactly the same in the output grid, some values are changed.
Q5: Identify the rule for changing the values in the rows taken from the input grid.
Q6: Apply the rules identified in Q3 and Q5 to the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.
